mapper.select: SELECT sh.student_homework_id, h.homework_id, h.homework_name, s.student_id, s.student_name, sh.submit_content, sh.submit_file, sh.create_time, sh.last_edit_time FROM student_homework sh , homework h , student s WHERE sh.homework_id = h.homework_id AND sh.student_id = s.student_id

SELECT sh.student_homework_id, h.homework_id, h.homework_name, h.homework_desc, c.course_id, c.course_name, s.student_id, s.student_name, sh.submit_content, sh.submit_file, sh.create_time, sh.last_edit_time FROM student_homework sh , homework h , student s , course c WHERE sh.student_homework_id = #{studentHomeworkId} AND sh.homework_id = h.homework_id AND sh.student_id = s.student_id AND h.course_id = c.course_id

SELECT sh.student_homework_id, h.homework_id, h.homework_name, s.student_id, s.student_name, s.email, sh.submit_content, sh.submit_file, sh.create_time, sh.last_edit_time FROM student_homework sh , homework h , student s WHERE h.course_id = #{homework.course.courseId} AND sh.homework_id = h.homework_id AND sh.student_id = s.student_id

SELECT sh.student_homework_id, h.homework_name, s.student_name, sh.submit_content, sh.create_time FROM student_homework sh , homework h , student s , course c WHERE c.teacher_id = #{homework.course.teacher.teacherId} AND sh.homework_id = h.homework_id AND sh.student_id = s.student_id AND h.course_id = c.course_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student_homework (student_homework_id, homework_id, student_id, submit_content, submit_file, create_time) VALUES (#{studentHomeworkId},#{homework.homeworkId},#{student.studentId},#{submitContent},#{submitFile},#{createTime})
